text: Margaret Jane "Dee Dee" Myers (born September 1, 1961) is an American political analyst. She was the 19th White House Press Secretary from January 20, 1993 until December 22, 1994 and was the first female press secretary. Category:1961 births Category:American political writers Category:White House Press Secretaries Category:Writers from Rhode Island Category:Living people
title: Dee Dee Myers
